title: Week 4 Preview from Knoxville
description:
Jen Lada, Desmond Howard, and David Pollack discuss if Anthony Richardson or Hendon Hooker will perform better under pressure this weekend. Plus, who's favored to win the Heisman going into week four. Also, will Oregon State be able to pull off an upset against USC? Finally, which basketball school will remain undefeated for another week, Duke or Kansas?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: CFB Live: The crew gives their insights on the biggest games coming up this weekend
